DOC.brief_summary: This study describe long-term antithrombotic management pattern real-life set patient hospitalize acute coronary syndrome China .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Follow-up antithrombotIc Management Patterns Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients Asia-China Extension
DOC.detailed_description: This study describe long-term ( 3 5 year acute coronary syndrome index event ) antithrombotic management pattern real-life set patient hospitalize acute coronary syndrome ( i.e . ST-segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction , Non-ST-segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction , Unstable Angina ) China .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent provide . 2 . Contact Order Form provide 3 . Aged 18 year old . 4 . Enrolled EPICOR Asia study complete 2 year followup . 1 . Presence condition/circumstance opinion investigator could significantly limit complete follow patient ( e.g . tourist , nonnative speaker understand local language , psychiatric disturbance , alcohol drug abuse ) . 2 . Already include EPICOR AsiaChina Extension observational study . 3 . Presence serious/severe comorbidities opinion investigator may limit short term ( i.e . 6 month ) life expectancy . 4 . Current participation interventional clinical trial . 5 . Patients receive ticagrelor beyond 12 month label use .
